CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc ChirpNet?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc ChirpNet is arc {FlickFlare}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc GameCast?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc GameCast is arc {FanConnect}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from StreamSphere to FanConnect in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from FanConnect to ChirpNet in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from FlickFlare to ChirpNet in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between FlickFlare and FanConnect in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between FlickFlare and FanConnect is {195}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between ChirpNet and FanConnect in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between ChirpNet and FanConnect is {347}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from ChirpNet?
SC.A: The total flow output from ChirpNet is {840}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by FanConnect?
SC.A: The total flow input by FanConnect is {1434}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 434? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {518} from {FanConnect} to {GameCast}, a flow of {461} from {GameCast} to {FanConnect}, a flow of {437} from {FanConnect} to {StreamSphere}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 204? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {195} from {FlickFlare} to {FanConnect}, a flow of {155} from {FanConnect} to {FlickFlare}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 301 and 362? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {347} from {ChirpNet} to {FanConnect}, a flow of {323} from {FlickFlare} to {ChirpNet}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from FanConnect to ChirpNet or from ChirpNet to FlickFlare?
NC.A: The flow from {FanConnect} to {ChirpNet} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from StreamSphere to FanConnect, from FanConnect to ChirpNet, or from FanConnect to FlickFlare?
NC.A: The flow from {StreamSphere} to {FanConnect} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {FlickFlare}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {FanConnect} and {GameCast}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc FlickFlare, Arc ChirpNet, Arc FanConnect, Arc GameCast, Arc StreamSphere}.
